channel.title: Looking for a working rsc source and client download
channel.description: hi, i'm looking for a working link for rsc source and client. Can anyone help me please?

item.title: Looking for a working rsc source and client download
item.dc:creator: @Aleka Aleka
item.description:
@Aleka wrote:

What happens when you click run_client.bat in your client folder?
Also make sure the ip is set correctly in the settings.ini in the client folder.

Read full topic
